fields.overview: 쓰레기로 인한 지구의 환경 오염에 대해 생각할 거리를 주는 교훈적인 내용의 애니메이션
fields.title: 킹 샤키르 - 쓰레기 전쟁

fields.overview: It's about the lonely garbage detective Hansjörg Stähli, who's looking for a garbage criminal and true love.
fields.title: Recycling Lily

fields.overview: In an overpopulated and underprivileged suburban neighbourhood, Jacob, a boy immobilised on a wheelchair, fights to protect a girl he spots across the courtyard, doing all he can to warn her of the dark figure entering her room - The Recycling Man.
fields.title: The Recycling Man

fields.original_title: Bob the Builder on Site: Green Homes and Recycling
fields.overview: Learn about the earth-friendly world of eco homes and recycling centers from Bob the Builder, who shows how old things can be used in fun new ways.
fields.title: Bob the Builder on Site: Green Homes and Recycling

fields.original_title: Recycling in Germany: Turning Waste Into Money
fields.overview: Gold-rush atmosphere in the recycling industry, waste as an economic engine. Every year, 40 million metric tons of waste end up in the trash cans of German households. Thanks to strict regulations and precise specifications for waste separation, this waste is turned into new raw materials.
fields.title: Recycling in Germany: Turning Waste Into Money

fields.original_title: All About Garbage and Recycling - All About Trucks
fields.overview: Join Backpack Jack and his friends as they dive into the big stinky and amazing story of garbage. Then take a road trip in a big old 18-wheeler and see what it's like to sleep in the cab hook up the trailer and even talk to other truckers on the CB radio! Scoop up big snow drifts in a snow plow.
fields.title: All About Garbage and Recycling - All About Trucks

fields.overview: The night of November 22, a recycling center outside Stockholm; Sweden will be bombed. A suspect is arrested and during the interrogation with her further circumstances arise. Soon it turns out that nothing is what it initially seems to be.
fields.title: Recycling and Waste

fields.overview: As the gravedigger prepares for the next funeral, each time he digs a hole he wonders about his own death.
fields.title: Recycling

fields.overview: This documentary explores the SAVEART movement, which began in 2003 with the goal of using art made of recycled materials to address the climate crisis.
fields.title: Saveart: Recycling Art

fields.overview: This story is about a beggar, a thief, and a child working on the street, a paper garbage collector, a leftist, a Muslim, a father and a second hand book dealer... All of them are the same man. Oktay Cetinkaya started his life a beggar in primary school years in Adana.His experiences of both hard and joyful times of life are different from everyone else's and now he continues his life as the owner of one of the biggest second hand bookstores in Istanbul. This young man, full of life, tells us the stories of back streets, his friends that are drug addicts, street children, beggars, garbage collectors- ghosts with whom he shared his own history, living as one of them.
fields.title: Recycling Life - I Found Dostoyevsky in the Garbage

fields.overview: 흥행작가인 쉬쉰(이심결 분)은 출판기념회에서 다음 작품은 귀신 세계를 소재로 한 '귀역'이 될 것이라고 공언한다. 하지만 쓰는 족족 작품이 맘에 들지 않자 원고를 폐기해버린다. 그런데 희한하게도 원고 속의 이야기가 현실이 되어 그녀 앞에 펼쳐지는 것이 아닌가. 두려움에 떨던 그녀는 어느 날 밤 엘리베이터에서 괴상한 노파에 이끌려 기이한 공간으로 들어가게 되는데...
fields.title: 귀역

fields.original_title: 劇場版 RE:cycle of the PENGUINDRUM ［前編］君の列車は生存戦略
fields.overview: What would you do to save someone you love? All brothers Shoma and Kanba know is that, after collapsing in an aquarium and apparently dying, their terminally ill sister Himari was somehow revived by a Penguin hat that she had wished for. Now they're on an impossible mission, because the price of keeping Himari alive is to find a mysterious object called the Penguindrum, and they'll do anything to save their sister. Anything.  As they travel separate paths in their search, they'll have to unravel complex riddles, make alliances with strangers they know they shouldn't trust, and question the very fabrics of time and destiny.
fields.title: 극장판 돌아가는 펭귄드럼 [전편] 너의 열차는 생존전략

fields.overview: Rıdvan and Umut, who make a living by collecting garbage and hoping on the corners of the street, become one of the leading recyclers of the market, with the secret game of slowly overthrowing the king of Zanyar, whose name only entered their world, and sitting at the top of the recycling market. Fırat goes after Zanyar to prevent everything from being taken away from him. And the war begins.
fields.title: ZANYAR: A Recycling Mafia

fields.original_title: 劇場版 RE:cycle of the PENGUINDRUM ［後編］僕は君を愛してる
fields.overview: What would you do to save someone you love? All brothers Shoma and Kanba know is that, after collapsing in an aquarium and apparently dying, their terminally ill sister Himari was somehow revived by a Penguin hat that she had wished for. Now they're on an impossible mission, because the price of keeping Himari alive is to find a mysterious object called the Penguindrum, and they'll do anything to save their sister. Anything.  As they travel separate paths in their search, they'll have to unravel complex riddles, make alliances with strangers they know they shouldn't trust, and question the very fabrics of time and destiny.
fields.title: 극장판 돌아가는 펭귄드럼 [후편] 나는 너를 사랑해

fields.overview: In a place where extremes are raised, a tough choice has to be made. An ex-mujahideen struggles to reconcile his faith and reality. But he faces setbacks at every turn as he is forced to collect cardboard in the streets of Zarqa, an occupation barely sustaining his family. As his situation deteriorates he has to make a radical decision to save himself from humiliation. Abu Amar found himself disillusioned with the chaos Afghanistan was left in during the 80's and tried to clear this confusion by writing a book on Jihad. However insightful and moderate, he has failed so far to publish his work. In the meantime his attempts to build a normal life in the impoverished town where Iraq Al Qaiada leader Al Zarqawi grew up are failing.
fields.title: Recycle

fields.overview: A "recycling" of old Sheena Ringo interviews along with some new footage produced by Space Shower TV, first airing some weeks before the release of "Ze-Chyou Syuu."
fields.title: Kyuudan Recycle

fields.original_title: Atık Sözlüğü: Tanımların ve İmajların Geri Dönüşümü
fields.title: Atık Sözlüğü: Tanımların ve İmajların Geri Dönüşümü
